statements: UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Login', event_description='User logged in successfully' WHERE user_id=12345;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Error', event_description='Invalid password attempt' WHERE user_id=54321;
UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'Login successful' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type = 'Access Denied', user_id = 101 WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE login_attempts SET status='success' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE access_permissions_changes SET action='update', new_permissions='{"read": true, "write": false}' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE login_attempts SET status = 'failed', ip_address = '127.0.0.1' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE access_permissions_changes SET action = 'grant', new_permissions = '{"read": true, "write": false}' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE login_attempts SET success = TRUE WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE access_permissions SET permission_type = 'READ' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE login_attempts SET success=false WHERE id=123;
UPDATE access_permissions SET permission_type='admin' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'Updated event description' WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE login_attempts SET success = true WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'Updated event description' WHERE event_id = '23b78235-df77-4bff-8298-12c103015c36';
UPDATE access_permissions SET permission_time = '2023-05-16 10:30:00' WHERE permission_id = '74e0436f-7a5d-4d46-b9b0-01a02cbb4052';
UPDATE audit_login_attempts SET success = true WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE audit_access_permissions SET action = 'grant' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE audit_login_attempts SET success = true WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE audit_security_events SET user_id = 'a123e456-7b89-12d3-a456-426614174000', timestamp = NOW(), description = 'User account locked' WHERE event_type = 'SECURITY' AND user_id = 'b987e654-3210-12d3-a456-426614174000';
